item.title: Installing Hugo on PC
item.description: This guide will walk you through the process of installing Hugo on your PC. Windows # Download the latest Hugo release from the official Hugo releases page. Extract the ZIP file to a folder, e.g., C:\Hugo\bin. Add the Hugo executable to your PATH: Right-click on ‘This PC’ and go to ‘Properties’. Click on ‘Advanced system settings’. Click on ‘Environment Variables’. Under ‘System variables’, find the ‘Path’ variable, select it and click ‘Edit’.
